content.heading: Sorry, you can’t use this service
content.legalGround: The only legal ground for divorce in England and Wales is if your marriage has broken down irretrievably.
content.confirm: You need to confirm this before the court can consider granting you a divorce.
content.notSure: If you’re not sure about getting a divorce, you may want to consider other options. Relationship advice and counselling is available from private therapists and charities such as Relate.

content.heading: Yn anffodus, ni allwch ddefnyddio’r gwasanaeth hwn
content.legalGround: Yr unig reswm cyfreithiol dros gael ysgariad yng Nghymru a Lloegr yw bod y briodas wedi chwalu’n gyfan gwbl.
content.confirm: Mae angen ichi gadarnhau hyn cyn y gall y llys ystyried rhoi ysgariad ichi.
content.notSure: Os nad ydych yn sicr eich bod eisiau ysgariad, efallai y byddai’n syniad ichi ystyried opsiynau eraill. Mae cyngor a chwnsela ar gael gan therapyddion preifat ac elusennau fel Relate.
